result.purpose: Defines a middleware function that conditionally skips a handler based on a predicate.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating middleware functionality and its associated tests within a dedicated directory.

middleware/skip/skip.go.purpose: Defines a middleware function that conditionally skips a handler based on a predicate.
side_effects: Modifies the request handling flow based on the predicate

middleware/skip/skip_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for the skip middleware in a Fiber web application.
side_effects: Tests the behavior of the skip middleware under different conditions.
